name: 1 Run RPG
description:
Can you finish an RPG game on a single run?

The last crystal was stolen by a running hooded man! Now you need to chase him to save the world!

This game was first made for Android phones. You can download the mobile version on the Play Store.

Have fun! And thanks for playing!

P.S. 
Feedback is appreciated. I'm on twitter! :) @d__adee
